backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles and poster uploads with access control, storing per-user blobs and enforcing user/admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented photo page enhancements and upload UI features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files’ roles, primarily styling, routing, and content pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend deployment checklist covering build verification, routing, integration, testing, troubleshooting, and rollback steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode overrides for the copper design system.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup configuring TanStack router (hash-based), React Query, Internet Identity provider, and all route definitions.
frontend/src/components/HiddenYouTubeAud: Stub component for a hidden YouTube audio player returning null.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Styled 404 page with card layout and link back to Home.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUploadGalle: Authenticated photo upload component handling file preview, upload, and display of user poster images.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with conditional navigation, footer, and routing outlet.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Renders the site’s responsive navigation bar with active link highlighting and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, updating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosterQueries.ts: Defines queries and mutations for fetching and uploading poster blobs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Handles fetching and updating the caller’s user profile using backend actor queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and custom light/dark theme variables for the app’s styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: A placeholder page that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays a styled page describing various Brotherhood divisions with icons, images, and text.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Renders a multi‑section narrative page detailing Texhoma’s lore and Colt Mercer’s origin using cards and structured story content. Includes static text, icons, and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero banner, mission statement, and feature cards linking to ranks, divisions, lore, and history pages.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Shows a full‑screen intro with a background image and a button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Presents a photo gallery page featuring images of T‑10 power armor and accessories using cards and custom gallery components.
frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx: Provides a posters page with a header and a placeholder card indicating the section is under construction.
frontend/src/pages/PropagandaPage.tsx: Renders a propaganda page with a header and a placeholder card noting the content is under construction.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Displays detailed descriptions of Brotherhood ranks using cards and categorized sections with iconography.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Lists uniform and armor variants for each rank with descriptive bullet points inside styled card sections.
frontend/src/types/youtube-iframe.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file reserved for YouTube iframe typings.
frontend/src/utils/posterImage.ts: Creates image URLs from ExternalBlob objects with a direct URL fallback and provides helpers for local previews and revoking blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s photo-upload features, existing entries, and a pending request for adding the T-0 armor photo and description.
